section.p: A participation by which a person in the role of 'Consenter' creates or 'authors' a Consent Directive.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] consenter, where its type is Consenter
Identifies the person who created or 'authored' the consent directive

Contains exactly one [1..1] functionCode with data type Code
Further defines the kind of participation by which a person in the role of 'Consenter' creates or 'authors' a Consent Directive.

Contains exactly one [1..1] functionCode with data type Code
Further defines the kind of participation by which a person in the role of 'Consenter' creates or 'authors' a Consent Directive.

Contains exactly one [1..1] consenter, where its type is Consenter
Identifies the person who created or 'authored' the consent directive
